casebody.data:
ADAMS CREEK ASSO.
v.
DAVIS, et al. No. 3P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. Anita S. Earls, for Davis & Reels. Claud R. Wheatly, III, Beaufort, for Adams Creek Asso.

Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 652 S.E.2d 677.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 8th day of January 2008 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion for Stay dissolved by order of the Court in conference this the 11th day of June 2008."
